title: Smart Design Templates Volume 2
description:
Can be used as a plug in for Smart Designer or use the vector art without the plug in

Overview:
This product has set an entirely new standard in production-ready digital art. With over 700 Smart Templates and 1,000 clip art images, each image is available in both a black/white and spot color version. Templates and clip art images were designed to be combined into countless custom graphics. We also include product templates of popular garments and promotional products as well as sales sheet and flyer layouts. Each template is available in CDR (CorelDRAW) and EPS formats for use with most popular graphics programs. Subject matter is primarily devoted to sports, but also includes events, clubs and political graphics
